segments.text: Excuse me Miss , my friend is sick .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is he ? Yes . He looks pale , is there anything I can do for him ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please give him some water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And do you have any medicine for air sickness ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , yes . I ’ ll give him the medicine too .
segments.speaker: S2
